amendment.description: An amendment numbered 89 printed in Part D of House Report 117-241 to insert H.R. 4996, the Ocean Shipping Reform Act, as passed by the House.
amendment.purpose: Amendment inserts H.R. 4996, the Ocean Shipping Reform Act, as passed by the House.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A008) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 367 - 59 (Roll no. 24).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A008) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Garamendi.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A008) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 367 - 59 (Roll no. 24).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A008) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 367 - 59 (Roll no. 24).
